name: Short Inca Trail 2 Days
description: Inca trail 2 days is an perfect alternative for visitors without a lot of time, and it Also Demands less physical effort than the full Inca Trail. On this hike, you can take in beautiful landscapes, exotic valleys, flora and wildlife and archeological centers, all with one of our professional guides. And of course, you will Have the unforgettable experience of walking through the sun gate and down to one of the wonders of the world, Machupicchu.
